definition: bypath/trail/bribery as a means of achieving a goal/minor arts (Confucian reference to agriculture, medicine, divination, and other professions unworthy of a gentleman)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job

sentences.english: On the trail the women talked excitedly about the future.
sentences.chinese: 走在崎岖的小道上，两个女人眉飞色舞地谈论着未来。

sentences.english: The path led straight through a wide stream.
sentences.chinese: 小道的前面横躺着一条小河，河面很宽。

sentences.english: Never have family or friends give quotes to the press. Handle your own business.
sentences.chinese: 不要让你的亲人或朋友给小道消息给媒体。

sentences.english: The winding trail caused us to lose our orientation.
sentences.chinese: 迂回曲折的小道使我们迷失了方向。

sentences.english: The path is too narrow for a truck to pass.
sentences.chinese: 这条小道窄得卡车开不过去。

sentences.english: They used axes to clear a path through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们用斧子开辟出一条穿过森林的小道。

sentences.english: Lost on the winding back roads of the Black Forest?
sentences.chinese: 在黑森林里的盘回小道上迷路了？

sentences.english: Above the treeline take a grassy path leading steeply towards the summit.
sentences.chinese: 过了林木线之后沿着长满青草的小道直通陡峭的山顶。

sentences.english: This bumpy, meandering byway is difficult to negotiate.
sentences.chinese: 这条崎岖的羊肠小道非常难走。

sentences.english: More and more mountain bikers are moonriding — speeding down trails.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多骑山地车的人喜欢骑车沿小道飞速而下。

sentences.english: We followed a well- beaten path through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿著常有人行走的小道穿过森林。

sentences.english: Boulevard, tree-lined, paths on both sides of flowers numerous and leafy.
sentences.chinese: 大道两旁绿树成荫，小道两边花繁叶茂。

sentences.english: Don't believe anything through the grapevine. There will plus much more gossipers.
sentences.chinese: 不要听任何小道音信，现在传闲话的人越来越多了。

sentences.english: QinQiong lead escort team after a piece of mountain path.
sentences.chinese: 秦琼带领押运队伍经过一片山间小道。

sentences.english: " And he said, "Oh, I heard it on the grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“我打听来的小道消息。”

sentences.english: Roads through the wilderness were built over trails opened by cattle.
sentences.chinese: 在牛群走出的小道上，修起了道路，穿越荒野。

definition: road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
winding road (twisting and turning like a sheep's intestine)
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
road or pavement laid with flagstones
